entry.def: When it is sunny, the sun is shining brightly.

example.ex: The weather was surprisingly warm and sunny...
example.tran: 天气出奇地暖和，阳光充足。

example.ex: There is a chance of sunny spells in the West.
example.tran: 西部可能会有一段天气晴朗的日子。

entry.tran: 阳光明媚的;阳光照耀的
entry.def: Sunny places are brightly lit by the sun.

example.ex: Most roses like a sunny position in a fairly fertile soil.
example.tran: 多数玫瑰在土地肥沃、阳光充足的地方长得最好。

entry.def: Someone who has a sunny disposition is usually cheerful and happy.

example.ex: He was a nice lad — bright and with a sunny disposition...
example.tran: 他是个不错的小伙子——聪明伶俐而且性格开朗。

example.ex: The staff wear big sunny smiles.
example.tran: 员工的脸上都带着灿烂的笑容。

entry.def: If a fried egg is served sunny side up, it is cooked on one side only, with the yellow part on top.

example.ex: I want my eggs sunny side up.
example.tran: 我想要只煎一面的鸡蛋。

means.word_mean: 2. bright and pleasant; promoting a feeling of cheer;

auth_sentence.content: The winters are cold but generally dry and sunny.
auth_sentence.res_content: The winters are cold but generally dry and sunny.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The winters are cold but generally dry and sunny.

auth_sentence.content: Cyprus is a very sunny island even in winter.
auth_sentence.res_content: Cyprus is a very sunny island even in winter.

auth_sentence.content: It was a sunny day, with waves crashing.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was a sunny day, with waves crashing.

Sentence.sentence: Mr Obama's plan to curb carbon dioxide (CO2) emissions (排放), though necessary, will be far from cost-free, whatever his sunny speeches on the subject might suggest.
Solar homes produce the most power on the hot sunny afternoons when everyone rushes home to turn up the air conditioner
They needn't pay a single cent for their power consumption on sunny days.
After a cold start, most of the country should be warm and sunny.

means.word_mean: 阳光充足的, 阳光明媚的

sentences.en: It was a warm sunny day.
sentences.cn: 那是个温暖的阳光明媚的日子。

means.word_mean: 令人愉快的, 快活的, (性格)开朗的

sentences.en: The waiter has a sunny disposition.

jushi.english: He always looks on the sunny side of things.
jushi.chinese: 他对事物总是抱乐观态度。

jushi.english: She is still on the sunny side of forty, ready to marry again.
At 60, he remains a sunny optimism.
jushi.chinese: 他已是60岁的人了,可是他仍充满朝气,乐观愉快。
